definition: used of milk and milk products from which the cream has been removed, reading or glancing through quickly, read superficially
details:
adjective
- used of milk and milk products from which the cream has been removed
= example: used of milk and milk products from which the cream has been removed
= synonyms: skimmed
noun
- reading or glancing through quickly
= synonyms: skimming
- a thin layer covering the surface of a liquid
= example: a thin layer covering the surface of a liquid
verb
- read superficially
= synonyms: skim over
- move or pass swiftly and lightly over the surface of
= synonyms: skim over
- remove from the surface
= example: remove from the surface
= synonyms: cream, cream off, skim off
- coat (a liquid) with a layer
- cause to skip over a surface
= synonyms: skip
- travel on the surface of water
= synonyms: plane
- examine hastily
= synonyms: scan
